BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_ROSTER_DTL (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_ROSTER_ID, STR_ROSTER_CAT, STR_REGISTRATION_NO, GNUM_SLNO_REG, STR_GUARD_NAME, DT_FROM_DATE, DT_TO_DATE, NUM_SHIFT_NO, STR_PLACE, STR_FROM_TIME, STR_TO_TIME, STR_PREPARED_BY, DT_EFFECT_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_ROSTER_DTL SET DT_FROM_DATE=?, DT_TO_DATE=?, NUM_SHIFT_NO=?, STR_PLACE=?, STR_FROM_TIME=?, STR_TO_TIME=?, STR_PREPARED_BY=?, DT_EFFECT_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? WHERE NUM_ROSTER_ID=?
UPDATE EST_ROSTER_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_ROSTER_ID=?
